transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Haan ji.
Customer: Haan ji.
Executive: Hello. Haan main sir se bol raha hun wo abhi tak mera naam change nahi hua India Mart pe ye mera GST number hai na.
Executive: Haan haan sir aap Chaudhary ji bol rahe hain na.
Customer: Haan haan.
Executive: Haan sir uski main request mein dalunga tab then change hoga na sir maine aapki request kar di thoda time lagta hai usme.
Customer: Okay isme isme bhi jo naam ye Chandra Chaudhary ki jagah change nahi kar sakte kya profile mein jo sambhalta hai uska naam nahi dal sakte kya lead manager ka.
Executive: Nahi sir jisme GST ka naam hoga sir GST ke according hota hai sir.
Customer: Achcha GST wale lenge theek hai.
Executive: Achcha main ja ke abhi check karke.
Customer: Haan ja ke abhi check karke update de deta hun aapko theek hai sir.
Customer: Haan ji check karke update theek hai.
summary:
Concerns:

- Name change not reflected on IndiaMART profile.

- Wants to change name to lead manager's name.



Resolution:

- Name change done as per GST details.

- Executive will check and provide an update.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will check and provide an update.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- name change, gst, profile update
